# 9.1 Maximum entropy

```{r 9.1}
p <- list()
p$A <- c(0, 0, 10, 0, 0)
p$B <- c(0, 1, 8, 1, 0)
p$C <- c(0, 2, 6, 2, 0)
p$D <- c(1, 2, 4, 2, 1)
p$E <- c(2, 2, 2, 2, 2)
```


```{r 9.2}
p_norm <- lapply(p, function(q) q/sum(q))
p_norm
```

```{r 9.3}
(H <- sapply(p_norm, function(q) -sum(ifelse(q == 0, 0, q*log(q)))))
```

```{r 9.4}
ways <- c(1, 90, 1260, 37800, 113400)
logwayspp <- log(ways)/10
```

```{r}
plot(logwayspp, H)
```
